    • Field Detail

      • wiki

        protected final WikipediaJwpl wiki
        Wikipedia JWPL connector

      • locale

        protected final java.util.Locale locale
        Language of the Wikipedia dump

      • rootDirectory

        protected java.io.File rootDirectory
        Root directory wherein the output will be stored. Its path is root/type/lang where:
        • root is a given parent directory.
        • type is the type of the preprocessing procedure.
        • lang is the language of the preprocesed Wikipedia.

    • Constructor Detail

      • AbstractPreprocess

        protected AbstractPreprocess(TypePreprocess type,
                  java.lang.String name,
                  java.util.Locale locale,
                  int year,
                  java.io.File root)
                      throws WikiApiException
        Creates a preprocess method able to preprocess pages from the Wikipedia dump identified by language and year. The preprocess is identified by name This new instance doesn't implements the #preprocess() function.
        Parameters:
        type - Type of preprocess
        name - Identifier
        language - Language of the Wikipedia dump
        year - Year of the Wikipedia dump
        rootDirectory - Directory wherein the preprocess stores the output directory
        Throws:
        WikiApiException

    • Method Detail

      • getInstance

        public static final AbstractPreprocess getInstance(TypePreprocess type,
                             java.lang.String name,
                             java.util.Locale language,
                             int year,
                             java.io.File rootDirectory)
                                            throws WikiApiException
        Creates a preprocess method able to preprocess pages from the Wikipedia dump identified by language and year. The preprocess is identified by name This new instance implements the preprocess function related to the given type.
        Parameters:
        type - Type of preprocess
        name - Identifier
        language - Language of the Wikipedia dump
        year - Year of the Wikipedia dump
        rootDirectory - Directory wherein the preprocess stores the output directory.
        Returns:
        An instance of preprocess which the implementation of #preprocess() related to its type. If the type is unknown, a null object is returned.
        Throws:
        WikiApiException

      • preprocess

        public abstract java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> preprocess(int id)
                                                          throws WikiApiException,
                                                                 java.io.FileNotFoundException,
                                                                 javax.xml.bind.JAXBException,
                                                                 java.io.IOException,
                                                                 LinkTargetException,
                                                                 CompilerException
        Function which implements the preprocessing procedure.
        Returns:
        A list of text fragments which are the result of the preprocessing.
        Throws:
        javax.xml.bind.JAXBException
        java.io.FileNotFoundException
        java.io.IOException
        LinkTargetException
        CompilerException
        WikiApiException

      • writePreprocessing

        public java.io.File writePreprocessing(java.util.Collection<java.lang.String> fragments,
                              java.io.File root,
                              int pageID)
                                throws java.io.IOException
        Writes the result of a preprocessing in the given output file. Each fragment is written in one line.
        Parameters:
        fragments - Set of text fragments resulted from a preprocessing.
        output - File wherein the fragments must be written.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • run

        public void run()
        This function is executed when the instance is treated as a thread.
        It preprocess all the pages and writes the results in files. This files are stored in the rootDirectory
        Specified by:
        run in interface java.lang.Runnable
        Overrides:
        run in class java.lang.Thread
        See Also:
        Thread

        public boolean removePage(java.lang.Integer page)
        Removes a page to preprocess
        Parameters:
        page - ID of the Wikipedia page
        Returns:
        true if the set of pages contained that page. false otherwise.

      • skipPage

        protected boolean skipPage(int pageID)
                    throws WikiApiException
        Checks if the page must be skipped.
        Parameters:
        pageID - Identifier of the page
        Returns:
        true if the page which id pageID must not be preprocessed. false otherwise.
